page.title: 16St. Michael's Church
page.content: We went to visit St.Michael's Church Stanground.It is used for{Church of {England}services and for the{Roman {Catholic Mass.} It is a modern building and we counted one hundred and sixty-five chairs for people to sit on.We saw the different parts of the church.There was a font where babies are baptized and the organ and a gold cross.We looked at the Pascal candle and the robes that the priest wears for Mass.The church has red carpets and a curtain behind the altar.The walls are painted white.Outside the church are lawns and flower beds and some trees.
